meanings.definition: The quality or state of being weedy.
meanings.sent1: The garden's weediness made it difficult to maintain.
meanings.sent2: The weediness of the field was overwhelming.
meanings.sent3: The weediness of the yard was like a jungle!
meanings.sent4: Her unkempt hair had a certain weediness to it.
meanings.sent5: The weediness of the forest was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The tendency to grow like a weed.
meanings.sent1: His garden's weediness was a constant battle.
meanings.sent2: The weediness of the plant surprised the gardener.
meanings.sent3: The weediness of the vine was like a race to the top!
meanings.sent4: Her ambition had a weediness that spread rapidly.
meanings.sent5: The weediness of the ivy was unstoppable.

meanings.sent1: The farmer battled the weediness in his crops.
meanings.sent2: The weediness in the flower bed needed attention.
meanings.sent3: The weediness of the garden was a constant annoyance.
meanings.sent4: The weediness in the lawn was a sign of neglect.
meanings.sent5: The weediness of the field was a challenge to overcome.
